title: The Bachelorette: The MAJOR clue that Carlin Sterritt wins Angie Kent's heart
text:
Angie Kent swooned over Carlin Sterritt during Wednesday night's season premiere of The Bachelorette.

And viewers are now convinced the 30-year-old personal trainer wins the show based on the music that played in the background during his introduction.

Fans of the Channel 10 franchise will have immediately recognised the 'winner's theme': a musical motif known to signal a contestant's eventual victory.

Sounds like a winner? Fans are convinced Carlin Sterritt (right) wins Angie Kent's (left) heart on The Bachelorette based on the music that played in the background during his introduction

As Carlin stepped out of the limousine in a tailored white suit and walked up to Angie, a familiar-sounding melody could be heard.

The same romantic music accompanied Angie's piece-to-camera interview, in which she said Carlin made her 'feel like a schoolgirl [with a] crush'.

A similar soundtrack played during Stu Laundy's grand entrance via helicopter when he first met Sophie Monk during the 2017 season of The Bachelorette.

A giveaway? A similar soundtrack played during Stu Laundy's grand entrance via helicopter when he first met Sophie Monk during the 2017 season of The Bachelorette

Despite being an intruder half way through season, the third generation publican went on to win Sophie's heart in the finale.

The pair eventually broke up six months later.

The instantly recognisable 'winner's theme' was also heard in the first season of The Bachelorette in 2015 when Sasha Mielczarek greeted Sam Frost.

History repeats itself! The instantly recognisable 'winner's theme' was also heard in the first season of The Bachelorette in 2015 when Sasha Mielczarek greeted Sam Frost

Sasha went on to win the show, but he and Sam broke up after 18 months.

Another romantic melody played in the background when Richie Strahan met his eventual winner, Alex Nation, on The Bachelor in 2016.

So if previous seasons are anything to go by, these musical cues all but confirm that Carlin wins the show this year.

The Bachelorette continues Thursday at 7:30pm on Channel 10

A giveaway? The same combination of strings, chimes and piano played in the background when Alex Nation first met Richie Strahan on The Bachelor in 2016
description: Angie Kent swooned over  Carlin Sterritt during Wednesday night's season premiere of The Bachelorette.
authors: Alisha Buaya For Daily Mail Australia
